On.Send: AnimBracketStart BSD Birth Stand Death Instant

On.Terms: ActorCreation; ValidateUnit IsFlying; Option Shadow Low; $AllowBlobShadow
ActorCreation; ValidateUnit IsNotFlying; Option Shadow Low; $AllowBlobShadow
FlyerHelperChange; FlyerHelper Selected; HasStatus FlyerHelper; !ScopeContains FlyerHelperSplat
FlyerHelperChange; FlyerHelper All; ValidateUnit IsFlying; !ScopeContains FlyerHelperSplat

On.Send: AnimBracketStart $BSD Stand Stand Death OpeningPlayForever 0.010000 AsTimeScale
AnimBracketStart BSD Birth Stand Death ContentNonLooping,ContentPlayOnce 5.900000 AsDuration
